Press reviews
"A detailed narrative of the politics, aesthetics, and planning involved in the park's creation, accompanied by a rich trove of illustrations. ... [No other book on Central Park] can match the combination of narrative and graphic detail." - Y. Phleet, Bloomsbury Review 2008/08/01
